data.text: Antioghɨn itir Kraisɨn adarasi, men marazi Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba ko tisaba. Men ziabar kara: Barnabas, ko Simeon (an ziar mam Niger) ko Sairinin gumazim Lusius, ko Manain (a Atrivim Herotɨn roroam, a Herot koma aghungi) ko Sol.13:1 Ziar kam Niger, an mɨngarim kamaghɨn ghu, “pɨzim.” Gumazir maba ghaze, Simeon Niger, a Afrikan gumazim.

13:2 Aposel 9:15; Rom 10:15; Galesia 1:15; Efesus 3:7-8; 1 Timoti 2:7; Hibru 5:4Ezɨ dughiar mamɨn Kraisɨn adarasi, me Godɨn apengan ikia uari isa God ganɨga, God ko mɨkɨmasa dagheba ta. Ezɨ Godɨn Duam kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kɨ Barnabas ko Sol uan ingangarim bagha aningɨn dia. Ia ingangarir kam bagh aning amɨseveghtɨ, aning nan ingangarim bagh mangɨ.”
13:3 Aposel 6:6Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me God ko mɨkɨmasa dagheba tagha, God ko mɨgei. Egha uan dafariba Barnabas ko Sol gisɨn atɨgha, aning amadazɨ aning zui.
Ezɨ Godɨn Duam Barnabas ko Sol amadazɨ, aning Selusian nguibar ekiamɨn ghugha, ua kurim inigha Saiprusɨn Arighatɨzimɨn ghu.
13:5 Aposel 12:12; 12:25; 13:13; 13:46; 15:37Egha me Salamisɨn otivigha Judaba God ko mɨgeir dɨpenibar, Godɨn akam akuri. Jon Mak aning ko ghua aningɨn akura.
Me Saiprusɨn nguibar arighatɨzim bar a garua ghua, Pafosɨn nguibar ekiamɨn oto. Egha me Judan kukunir gumazir mam bato. A Godɨn akam inigha izir ifavarir gumazim, an ziam Bar-Iesus.
A gavmanɨn gumazir dapanim Sergius Paulus ko iti. Sergius Paulus, a gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba ko fofozir aghuiba itim. A Godɨn akam baraghasa, egha kamaghɨn a Pol ko Barnabasɨn diazɨ aning ize.

13:8 2 Timoti 3:8Kukunir gumazir kam, me Grighɨn akamɨn ziar kam Elimas a gatɨ, an mɨngarim kukunir gumazim. Elimas, a gavmanɨn gumazim Sergius Paulus, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Iesusɨn ikian an aghua. Elimas, Barnabas ko Solɨn ingangarim pazɨva a damuasa.

Ezɨ Sol, an ziar mam Pol, Godɨn Duam a gizɨvazɨma, a dɨkɨravɨra Elimasɨn gara kamaghɨn mɨgei,13:9 Ziar kam Sol, a Hibrun akamɨn otivir ziar mam. Ezɨ ziar kam Pol, a Grighɨn akam otivir ziam. Gumazir maba ghaze, Sol Grighɨn akamɨn mɨgeir darazir tongɨn ingara, egha kamaghɨn dughiar kamɨn a ziar kam Pol uabɨ garɨsi.

13:10 Matyu 13:38; Jon 8:44; 1 Jon 3:8“Nɨ Satanɨn borim. Nɨ arazir aghuaribar apanimɨn iti. Ifavarir araziba ko arazir kuraba bar nɨ gizɨfa. Egha nɨ tizim baghavɨra Ekiamɨn arazir aghuibagh asɨghasɨsi? Nɨ ti arazir kuraba ataghɨraghan aghua?
13:11 Ua Me Ini 9:3; 1 Samuel 5:6; Aposel 9:8Datɨrɨghɨn Ekiam nɨn apanim damu uan gavgavimɨn nɨn damazimning okavigham. Eghtɨ nɨ aruer angazangarimɨn ganan kogh dughiatabar ikegham.”
Ezɨ gavmanɨn gumazir dapanim, Ekiamɨn akam baregha dɨgavir kuram gami. A bizir otivizir kabar ganigha, kamaghɨn a nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Ekiamɨn iti.
Ezɨ Pol ko gumazir a koma aruiba, me Pafosɨn kurim inigha ghua Pergan nguibamɨn otifi. A Pamfilian Provinsɨn aven iti. Ezɨ Jon Mak kagh me ategha uamategha Jerusalemɨn ghu.

Ezɨ me Pergan nguibamɨn dɨkavigha ghua Antioghɨn nguibamɨn otifi, a Pisidian Distrighɨn aven iti. Egha, Judaba avughsa Godɨn ziam fer dughiamɨn, me God ko mɨgeir dɨpenimɨn aven ghuegha apiaghav iti.13:14 A Sabatɨn dughiam.

13:15 Luk 4:16; Aposel 13:27; 15:21; Hibru 13:22Ezɨ God ko mɨgeir dɨpenimɨn garir gumazir dapanir ekiaba, me Moses Osirizir Araziba ko Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar akaba dar bora me mɨgei. Me dar ponegha gɨvagha, Pol ko Barnabas bagha akam amaga ghaze, “Aveghbuaba, ia akurvazir mɨgɨrɨgɨatam gumazir kabav kɨmsɨ, ia me mɨkɨm.”
Ezɨ Pol dɨkavigha, uan dafarimɨn me aminiva, kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia Israelɨn gumazamiziba ko, Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizir Godɨn atiatia uari isa God ganɨdiba, ia na baragh!

13:17 Ua Me Ini 1:7; 6:6; Godɨn Araziba 7:6-7; Onger Akaba 105:23-24Fomɨra Israelɨn gumazamizibar God en ovaviba amɨsevezɨma, kamaghɨn me an gumazamizibara. Egha gɨn me uan nguibam ategha ghua Isipɨn kantrin ghue. Egha dughiar kamɨn God me gamima men dɨbobonim bar pɨn ghua, me bar avɨraseme. Ezɨma gɨn God uan gavgavimɨn Isipɨn me inighava azenim gatɨ.
13:18 Ua Me Ini 16:35; Dɨboboniba 14:34; Godɨn Araziba 1:31; Onger Akaba 95:10; Aposel 7:36Egha a 40plan azenibar gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganim me ko ikia, men osɨmtɨziba atera men akurvasi.
13:19 Godɨn Araziba 7:1; Josua 14:1; Onger Akaba 78:55Egha Kenanɨn nguaziba, God 7plan gumazamizir bɨzim gasɨghasɨgha, men nguaziba isa uan gumazamizibagh anɨngi. Ezɨ me dar ghuaviba ikiangi.
13:20 Gumazir Dapaniba 2:16; 1 Samuel 3:20Bizir kaba 450 azenimɨn aven otifi.
“Dughiar kamɨn Israelia atrivim bagha Godɨn azangsɨsi. Ezɨ a Sol me ganɨngi, a Kisɨn otarim, egha Benjaminɨn adarazir gumazim, a 40plan azenibar men gari.

13:22 1 Samuel 13:14; 15:23-26; 16:12-13; 2 Samuel 2:4; Onger Akaba 89:20; Hosea 13:11Ezɨ God Sol agɨvagha, Devit amɨsevezɨ an an danganim inigha atrivimɨn oto. Ezɨ a Devitɨn gun me mɨgei, ‘Kɨ Devitɨn gani, Jesin otarim, gumazir kɨ bar ifongezim, bizir kɨ ifongeziba a bar dar amuam.’
“God fomɨra akam akɨrizɨ moghɨn, God gumazir mam amadazɨ a Israelɨn ize. A Iesus, Devitɨn ovavir mam, a en Akurvazir Gumazim.
“Iesus tɨghar izamin dughiamɨn, Jon faragha izava navibagh iraghamin akam ko rurumɨn akamɨn Israelɨn gumazamizibav gei.

13:25 Matyu 3:11; Mak 1:7; Luk 3:16; Jon 1:20-27Jonɨn ingangarir dughiam gɨvasava amima, a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, ‘Ia ghaze, kɨ tina? Kɨ gumazir ia mɨzua itim puvatɨ. A nan gɨn izi. Kɨ an dagarir asuabar beniba fɨran derazir puvatɨ. Kɨ gumazir kɨnim.’
“Aveghbuaba, ia Abrahamɨn igiaba, ko ia God gifuegha an apengan itir Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, e bagha, God uam e iniasa mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam amadazɨ a ize.

13:27 Luk 23:34; 24:20; 24:44; Jon 16:3; Aposel 3:17; 15:21; 1 Korin 2:8Jerusalemɨn gumazamiziba ko gumazir ekiaba, me kamaghɨn fozir puvatɨ, Iesus en Akurvazir Gumazim. Egha me zurara Sabatɨn dughiamɨn Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazimɨn akaba dɨbora, egha deragha dagh fozir puvatɨ. Egha ghaze gumazir kam aremegham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazimɨn akaba guizbangɨra otos.

13:28 Matyu 27:22-23; Mak 15:13-14; Luk 23:21-23; Jon 19:15Egha me a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghan mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir aghuitam batozir puvatɨ. Ezɨ me pamtem kamaghɨn Pailat mɨgei, nɨ mɨdorozir gumazibav kemeghtɨ me a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegh.

13:29 Matyu 27:57-61; Mak 15:42-47; Luk 18:31; 23:50-56; Jon 19:28-30; 19:36-42Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba fomɨra mɨkemezɨ moghɨn me ami. Egha me ter ighuvimɨn anedegha a inigha dagɨar torim gatɨ.
13:30 Matyu 28:6; Aposel 2:24Ezɨ God a gamizɨ a ua dɨkafi.
13:31 Aposel 1:3; 1:8A ko Galilin Distrighɨn ikia Jerusalemɨn zuir gumazamiziba, me dughiar avɨribar an gani. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn gumazir uari an ganizir kaba, me an gun Judan gumazamizibav gei.
“E Akar Aghuim kamaghɨn ia mɨgei. God fomɨra en ovaviba bagha akam akɨra ghaze, a gumazir uam e iniamim amadagham.

13:33 Onger Akaba 2:7; Rom 1:4; Hibru 1:5; 5:5Datɨrɨghɨn, a Iesus gamizɨ a matmatɨn ua dɨkafi. E men boriba, kamaghɨn amizɨ, an e bagha uan akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam gamizɨ a guizbangɨram oto. Onger Akabar Akɨnafarim sapta 2, kamaghɨn a mɨgei:
“E fo, God a gamizɨma a ua matmatɨn dɨkafi. Ezɨ a ua matmatɨn mangɨ kurighan kogham. God bizir kamɨn kamaghɨn mɨkeme:
“Ezɨ akar igharazir mam uaghan Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn iti. A kamaghɨn mɨgei:
“E fo, dughiar kamɨn Devit nguazimɨn ikia, a Godɨn nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn zui. Egha a gɨn aremezɨ, me an kuam inigha ghua an ovaviba afi naghɨn anefazɨ, an kuam kuri.

13:37-38 Daniel 9:24; Luk 24:47; Aposel 10:43; 1 Jon 2:12Ezɨ gumazir God amizɨ a ua matmatɨn dɨkavizir kamnang, an kuam kurizir puvatɨ. Nan adarasi, kamaghɨn amizɨma, e ua mɨgei, ia akar kam gɨfogh, gumazir kam Iesus ian arazir kuraba gɨn amangasa ize.

13:39 Aisaia 53:11; Rom 3:28; 8:3; 10:4; Hibru 7:19Moses Osirizir Araziba ian akuragh ian arazir kuraba gɨn amadaghtɨ, ia Godɨn damazimɨn deraghan kogham. Puvatɨ. Gumazir kam Iesusɨn ingangarimɨn, God gumazir nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba itiba bar, men akuragha men arazir kuraba bar, da gɨn amaga, me gamima me an damazimɨn dera.
13:40 Aisaia 29:14Ia uari bagh gan, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba fomɨra mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, bizitam ia batoghan kogham:
“ ‘Kɨ ian dughiamɨn bizir igharazitam damightɨ
Egha Pol ko Barnabas Judaba God ko mɨgeir dɨpenim ataghɨrazima, gumazamiziba kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Gua Sabatɨn munamɨn dughiamɨn uamategh izɨva bizir kabar mɨgɨrɨgɨar taba uam e mɨkɨm.”

13:43 Aposel 11:23; 14:22; Taitus 2:11; Hibru 12:15; 1 Pita 5:12Egha me bar God ko mɨgeir dɨpenim ategha azenan ghue. Ezɨ Judan avɨriba ko gumazamizir igharaziba, me Judan Arazibar gɨn zuir gumazamiziba, me Pol ko Barnabasɨn gɨn zui. Ezɨ aning me mɨgɨa, men nɨghnɨziba fa ghaze, ia Godɨn nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn mangɨ an apangkuvimɨn apengan ikɨ.
Ezɨ Sabatɨn dughiar igharazim otozɨ, nguibar ekiar kamɨn itir gumazamizir avɨrim bar iza uari akuvagha Ekiamɨn akam barasi.
13:45 Aposel 14:2; 18:6; 1 Pita 4:4; Jut 1:10Ezɨ Judaba gumazamizir okoruar kamɨn ganigha, men naviba bar ikufi. Ezɨ me Polɨn akabar kurakuragha a mɨgei.

Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Pol ko Barnabas atiatir puvatɨgha, akar bar gavgavimɨn me mɨgei, “Ia Judaba, ga faragha Godɨn akamɨn ia mɨkeme. Ezɨ ia akɨrim ragha akar kam gasara. Egha ghaze, e ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuir zurara itim inian kogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia oragh, ga uam akar kamɨn ia mɨkɨman kogham. Ga Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibav kɨmam.
13:47 Aisaia 42:6; 49:6; Luk 2:32Ekiam bizir kam bagha kamaghɨn e mɨkeme:
Ezɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, me akar kam baregha, bar akuegha ghaze, akar kam bar dera. Ezɨ gumazamizir God ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuir zurara ikiam bagha mɨseveziba, me bar nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an iti.
Ezɨ Ekiamɨn akam bar nguibaba bar dar ghu.

13:50 Aposel 17:4; 17:12Amizir maba God gifuegha an apengan ikia ziar ekiaba iti, ezɨ gumazir ziaba itir maba, me uaghan nguibar ekiar kamɨn iti. Judaba men navibagh inivima, me osɨmtɨziba Pol ko Barnabas garɨsi. Egha me uan distrighɨn aning batoke.

13:51 Matyu 10:14; Mak 6:11; Luk 9:5; 10:11; Aposel 18:6Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Pol ko Barnabas, uan dagarimningɨn itir nguaziba apɨsi, eghtɨ gumazamiziba fogh suam, men arazir kam osɨmtɨzim me ganɨngi. Ezɨ, Pol ko Barnabas Antiok ategha Aikoniam nguibamɨn ghu.
13:52 Matyu 5:12; Jon 16:22; Aposel 2:46Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Antioghɨn itir Kraisɨn suren gumazamiziba, Godɨn Duam bar me gizɨvazɨma me bar akonge.
